title: Iot-Based DC Motor Speed Control Learning Module with PID
description:
- Developed the hardware programming for ESP32 to control DC motor speed using PID algorithms.
- Implemented MQTT for seamless data transmission between the ESP32 and the cloud platform.
- Managed database integration for storing and retrieving motor performance data and control parameters.
- Contributed to web programming to create a user interface for real-time monitoring and control of the DC motor module.

title: IoT-Based Water Pipe Leak Detection Device
description:
-Designed an IoT solution for water pipe leak detection with real-time flow sensor integration.
- Managed PCB design, assembly, soldering, and troubleshooting until the prototype was functional.
- Developed C software for data acquisition, analysis, and cloud transmission.

title: Greenhouse Monitoring System Using ESP32
description:
- Developed an ESP32-based greenhouse monitoring system that provides environmental data analysis and growth optimization recommendations.
- Successfully integrated ESP32, temperature & humidity sensors, and Arduino IDE code for data collection.
- Collaborated in a team to ensure effective hardware and software integration and optimal system performance.

title: Analog Mini Audio Amplifier
description:
- Designed and optimized analog mini amplifier schematics, improving efficiency and sound quality through circuit analysis.
- Successfully managed assembly, component selection, functionality testing, output adjustment, and troubleshooting to produce a working amplifier.
- Collaborated effectively in a team to achieve project targets by applying problem-solving skills.

title: Electronic Diagnostic Test Pen
description:
- Developed an electronic test pen, including PCB design, component assembly, soldering, and troubleshooting.
- Managed the entire project, from concept to final implementation, ensuring circuit performance met standards.
